name: Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC)
description: This article explores the CFTC’s regulatory framework, its impact on brokers, the safeguards it offers retail traders, and practical guidance for selecting a legitimate broker. As of 2025, the core forex regulations, established in 2010, remain largely unchanged, ensuring a stable environment for market participants.

brokerRequirements.requirement: Each forex firm needs at least one NFA-approved Associated Person

bottomline: The CFTC’s framework isn’t about stifling innovation—it’s about ensuring the forex market’s integrity outlives its participants.
